title: Zscaler tops quarterly estimates on strong cybersecurity demand
description: Zscaler beat Wall Street estimates for quarterly revenue and profit on Thursday, driven by strong demand for its cloud and artificial intelligence security solutions.
content:
Enterprise spending on cyber protection solutions has increased as digital threats have gotten more sophisticated. Zscaler's flexible purchasing program has helped it sign larger, multi-year platform deals with enterprise clients.

title: Warner Music Group settles copyright case with Suno for licensed AI music
description: (Reuters) -Warner Music Group settled its copyright infringement case with artificial intelligence-powered song creation platform Suno, enabling the startup to launch licensed AI models next year, the companies said on Tuesday.
content:
(Reuters) -Warner Music Group settled its copyright infringement case with artificial intelligence-powered song creation platform Suno, enabling the startup to launch licensed AI models next year, the companies said on Tuesday.

title: Dozens of state attorneys general urge US Congress not to block AI laws
description: (Reuters) -Republican and Democratic attorneys general from 35 states and the District of Columbia urged congressional leaders on Tuesday not to block state laws governing artificial intelligence, warning of "disastrous consequences" if the technology is left unregulated.

title: HP to cut about 6,000 jobs by 2028, ramps up AI efforts
description: HP Inc said on Tuesday it expects to cut between 4,000 and 6,000 jobs globally by fiscal 2028 as part of a plan to streamline operations and adopt artificial intelligence to speed up product development, improve customer satisfaction and boost productivity.
content: HP Inc said on Tuesday it expects to cut between 4,000 and 6,000 jobs globally by fiscal 2028 as part of a plan to streamline operations and adopt artificial intelligence to speed up product development, improve customer satisfaction and boost produc... [1762 chars]

title: How AI’s biggest loser turned into the hottest stock in the world
description: It’s not that long ago that Alphabet was being derided as the big technology firm most vulnerable to the artificial intelligence revolution. How things change.
content:
Macquarie strategist Viktor Shvets has a theory about the speed with which sharemarket winners and losers can emerge in a world where abundant capital has become fused with incredible technology.

title: NetApp beats quarterly estimates on robust data storage demand
description: NetApp beat Wall Street estimates for second-quarter profit and revenue on Tuesday, helped by strong demand for its data storage services and all-flash storage products used in artificial intelligence applications.
content:
The company's shares rose 3% in extended trading after it also raised its annual profit forecast.

title: AI platform Suno unveils deal with Warner Music Group
description: The US artificial intelligence platform Suno and Warner Music Group have announced a partnership to compensate recording artists in the fast-growing domain of AI music.
content:
The US artificial intelligence platform Suno and Warner Music Group have announced a partnership to compensate recording artists in the fast-growing domain of AI music.

title: 'Guaranteed Human': Audio giant iHeartMedia says real people, not AI personalities, are at the controls
description: Radio station DJs now are expected to say "Guaranteed Human," as part of their hourly on-air disclosures. The move comes amid fears about the use of artificial intelligence.
content:
As media executives wrestle with the use of artificial intelligence, radio giant iHeartMedia wants to stand out.
“We don’t use AI-generated personalities. We don’t play AI music that features synthetic vocalists pretending to be human,” Tom Poleman, ... [4040 chars]

title: Fact File: X's AI chatbot claims Carney isn't PM, Russian video set in Toronto
description: The artificial intelligence chatbot Grok made several errors over the past few weeks when asked to verify information on the X platform.
